name: Rumtek Monastery
info: Rumtek is the seat of the Karmapa and one of the most significant monasteries in Sikkim, known for its vibrant rituals and architecture.

name: Pemayangtse Monastery
info: Pemayangtse is one of the oldest monasteries in Sikkim, offering panoramic views and intricate woodwork reflecting Nyingma traditions.

name: Tashiding Monastery
info: Tashiding is revered for its spiritual purity and hosts the sacred Bumchu Festival, attracting pilgrims from across the region.

name: Enchey Monastery
info: Located near Gangtok, Enchey Monastery is known for its peaceful surroundings and Cham dance performances during festivals.

name: Dubdi Monastery
info: Dubdi, the oldest monastery in Sikkim, sits atop a hill in Yuksom and offers serene views and historical significance.

name: Ralang Monastery
info: Ralang Monastery is a major Kagyu institution in South Sikkim, known for its elaborate rituals and stunning murals.
